attributes.action: Carry out the wishes of the majority - leave the EU, Commence article 50 - NOW !
attributes.additional_details: the government decided it was right to give the British people the choice whether to stay or leave the EU. The people voted over 5 months ago now the MPs and the Government need to carry out the peoples wishes. this needs  to happen as soon as possible before the majority decide to take ACTION. On a scale possibly never seen in Great Britain before
attributes.background: 17,410,742 Voted YES to leave the EU, why are we still talking about when? the longer we take to start article 50, the more time we give the press to scare people and give the ones that lost the vote time to try and find a way to change what the British people decided was there future
